title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 586.1 - Purpose of this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 586.1 - Purpose of this part

State Regulations

This Part implements the State Environmental Quality Review

Act (SEQR) and establishes criteria for determining whether actions under
consideration by the agency will have a significant effect on the
environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
586.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
